Title: Provides civil immunity from damages for volunteers assisting in sports programs of non-profit-making organizations
Summary: Provides that any person who voluntarily and without compensation renders certain volunteer service in sports programs of non-profit-making organizations shall be immune from liability for civil damages for acts or omissions in rendering such service unless the act or omission constituted gross negligence or wilfull misconduct on the part of any such person.
LawCode: Add Art 3 Title 7 §§3-701 & 3-702, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to immunity from civil liability of persons assisting in sports programs of non-profit-making organizations
